languages.text: {n}Маражай чуть суживает глаза.{/n} "Я видал подобные устройства среди трофеев кабала. Не знаю, кто их сотворил, но им сложно отказать в изощренной изобретательности. В обмен на бессмертие превращают свою добычу в нечто, подобное тому, что еще недавно обитало в этих палатах".

{n}Marazhai slightly narrows his eyes.{/n} "I have seen similar devices among the trophies of the Kabal. I do not know who created them, but it is hard to deny their devious ingenuity. In exchange for immortality, they turn their prey into something similar to what inhabited these chambers until recently."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай чуть суживает глаза.{/n} "Я видал подобные устройства среди трофеев кабала. Не знаю, кто их сотворил, но им сложно отказать в изощренной изобретательности. В обмен на бессмертие превращают свою добычу в нечто, подобное тому, что еще недавно обитало в этих палатах".

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋微微眯起了眼睛。{/n}“我在阴谋团的战利品中见到过类似的装置。我不知道是什么人创造了这种东西，但那个人确实相当狡猾。尽管它可以赐予猎物永生，但也会将猎物变成怪物，类似于不久之前居住在洞穴里的那种东西。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai slightly narrows his eyes.{/n} "I have seen similar devices among the trophies of the Kabal. I do not know who created them, but it is hard to deny their devious ingenuity. In exchange for immortality, they turn their prey into something similar to what inhabited these chambers until recently."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋微微眯起了眼睛。{/n}“我在阴谋团的战利品中见到过类似的装置。我不知道是什么人创造了这种东西，但那个人确实相当狡猾。尽管它可以赐予猎物永生，但也会将猎物变成怪物，类似于不久之前居住在洞穴里的那种东西。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイがわずかに目を細める。{/n}「陰謀団の戦利品の中に似たようなものを見たことがあるぜ。誰が造ったのか知らないが、この一癖ある精巧さには否定しがたいものがある。不死と引き換えに、そいつは獲物を最近までこの部屋に居ついていた何かに似たものに変えてしまうのさ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai slightly narrows his eyes.{/n} "I have seen similar devices among the trophies of the Kabal. I do not know who created them, but it is hard to deny their devious ingenuity. In exchange for immortality, they turn their prey into something similar to what inhabited these chambers until recently."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイがわずかに目を細める。{/n}「陰謀団の戦利品の中に似たようなものを見たことがあるぜ。誰が造ったのか知らないが、この一癖ある精巧さには否定しがたいものがある。不死と引き換えに、そいつは獲物を最近までこの部屋に居ついていた何かに似たものに変えてしまうのさ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai plisse légèrement les yeux.{/n} « J'ai vu des appareils de ce genre parmi les trophées de la Kabale. J'ignore qui les a créés, mais on ne peut nier leur sournoise ingéniosité. En échange de l'immortalité, ils transforment leur proie en une chose semblable à ce qui vivait dans ces salles encore récemment. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai slightly narrows his eyes.{/n} "I have seen similar devices among the trophies of the Kabal. I do not know who created them, but it is hard to deny their devious ingenuity. In exchange for immortality, they turn their prey into something similar to what inhabited these chambers until recently."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai plisse légèrement les yeux.{/n} « J'ai vu des appareils de ce genre parmi les trophées de la Kabale. J'ignore qui les a créés, mais on ne peut nier leur sournoise ingéniosité. En échange de l'immortalité, ils transforment leur proie en une chose semblable à ce qui vivait dans ces salles encore récemment. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra levemente los ojos.{/n} «He visto dispositivos similares entre los tesoros de la Kábala. No sé quién los creó, pero no negaré su diabólico ingenio. A cambio de la inmortalidad, convierten a su presa en algo similar a lo que habitaba estas cámaras hasta hace poco».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai slightly narrows his eyes.{/n} "I have seen similar devices among the trophies of the Kabal. I do not know who created them, but it is hard to deny their devious ingenuity. In exchange for immortality, they turn their prey into something similar to what inhabited these chambers until recently."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra levemente los ojos.{/n} «He visto dispositivos similares entre los tesoros de la Kábala. No sé quién los creó, pero no negaré su diabólico ingenio. A cambio de la inmortalidad, convierten a su presa en algo similar a lo que habitaba estas cámaras hasta hace poco».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai kneift leicht die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Ich habe ähnliche Geräte schon bei den Trophäen der Kabale gesehen. Ich weiß nicht, wer sie hergestellt hat, aber ihre hinterhältige Raffinesse lässt sich kaum leugnen. Im Austausch für Unsterblichkeit verwandeln sie ihre Beute in etwas, das so ähnlich ist wie die bisherigen Bewohner dieser Kammern."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai slightly narrows his eyes.{/n} "I have seen similar devices among the trophies of the Kabal. I do not know who created them, but it is hard to deny their devious ingenuity. In exchange for immortality, they turn their prey into something similar to what inhabited these chambers until recently."

Ich weiß nicht, wer sie hergestellt hat, aber ihre hinterhältige Raffinesse lässt sich kaum leugnen. Im Austausch für Unsterblichkeit verwandeln sie ihre Beute in etwas, das so ähnlich ist wie die bisherigen Bewohner dieser Kammern."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, hafifçe gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Kabal ganimetleri arasında benzer cihazlar görmüştüm. Kimin icat ettiğini bilmiyorum ancak gerçekten de ustaca bir oyun oynamışlar. Ölümsüzlük karşılığında avını az önce gördüğümüze benzer bir şeye çeviriyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai slightly narrows his eyes.{/n} "I have seen similar devices among the trophies of the Kabal. I do not know who created them, but it is hard to deny their devious ingenuity. In exchange for immortality, they turn their prey into something similar to what inhabited these chambers until recently."
